job_responsibilities: Develop and maintain high-quality React applications
Collaborate with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Developed and maintained high-performance React.js applications using TypeScript and Next.js.
Implemented state management solutions with Redux and Context API to improve scalability.
Optimized component rendering and performance, reducing page load time by 30%.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces using Tailwind CSS and SASS.
Led code reviews and mentored junior developers in best coding practices.
Integrated Jest and React Testing Library for unit and integration testing.
Developed dynamic user interfaces using React.js and TypeScript for SaaS applications.
Refactored legacy codebases and introduced modular component-based architecture.
Worked with Git, Webpack, and Figma for efficient development and design collaboration.
Built responsive layouts and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
Contributed to Agile development cycles, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives.

projects.name: TaskMaster
details: Built a task management platform with real-time updates and drag-and-drop functionality.
Used Firebase Authentication for secure user logins.
Implemented Redux for efficient state management.

projects.name: ShopVista
details: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce website using React.js and TypeScript.
Integrated Stripe API for seamless payments.
Optimized frontend performance, reducing page load times by 40%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Designed and built scalable web applications using React.js, TypeScript, and Node.js.
Developed GraphQL APIs, reducing backend response time by 40%.
Led a migration from a monolithic architecture to microservices using Docker and Kubernetes.
Implemented authentication and authorization systems using Firebase and OAuth.
Developed e-commerce websites using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase.
Optimized database queries in PostgreSQL, improving page load speeds by 30%.
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) for seamless checkout experiences.
Worked closely with UI/UX designers to enhance user experience.

projects.name: ShopEase
details: Developed a modern e-commerce platform with React.js and Node.js.
Integrated GraphQL API for efficient data fetching.
Implemented a real-time chat support feature using WebSockets.

projects.name: TaskFlow
details: Built a task management system with drag-and-drop functionality.
Used Firebase Authentication for secure user logins.
Optimized database reads and writes for better performance.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

responsibilities: Designed and developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
Integrated Firebase for real-time database management and push notifications.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Worked on UI/UX optimization, increasing user engagement by 25%.
Developed enterprise-level Android applications using Java and Kotlin.
Integrated RESTful APIs for seamless backend communication.
Optimized mobile app performance, reducing crash rates by 30%.

projects.name: HealthSync
details: Built a fitness tracking app with AI-based workout recommendations.
Integrated Google Fit and Apple Health for real-time health data synchronization.
Implemented a subscription-based model, increasing revenue by 20%.

projects.name: EduBridge
details: Developed a mobile-first e-learning platform with interactive video courses.
Integrated live streaming capabilities using WebRTC and AWS Media Services.
Created an AI-powered chatbot for instant student support.
